body.name: ZCWA Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo, 2 in 1 Mopping Robotic Vacuum with WiFi/App/Alexa, Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Schedule Settings, Self-Charging, Ideal for Hard Floor, Pet Hair and Carpet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 53 mins
features: 🏠[2-In-1 Mopping Robot Vacuum]: The 1400Pa mopping robot vacuum cleaner combo can quickly remove dust, paper scraps, and other garbage. Wet mop function and 230ml electric control water tank, even penetration, suitable for all hard floors, such as laminate, ceramic tiles, granite, parquet, etc.

📱[Smart App & Voice Control] You can easily create a home clean schedule, change the clean mode, and control the clean direction by using the Tuya Smart App. The auto vacuum robot is also compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, allowing users to make the robot start and stop the clean by voice commands. Remote control is also included in the package for your convenience. (⚠The APP only supports 2. 4GHz WiFi.)

🔔[Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Upgraded Again]: The robot vacuum has advanced 3D precise obstacle avoidance function, a full set of sensors can intelligently identify and avoid white walls, stairs, and obstacles. 2.87'' slim design helps the robot vacuum cleaner to reach every corner of a house or narrow space, clean leftover dirty areas, and keep your house neat.

🔋[100mins Runtime & Self-charging]: Both mopping and vacuuming offer two levels of intensity adjustment, adjustable for different floor types. With 2500mAh battery capacity, the robotic vacuum cleaner can continuously work 100min in a 1290sqft house, and will automatically back to the charging base and recharge when in low battery or finished cleaning.

💪[4 High-Efficiency Cleaning Modes]: The robot vacuum and mop combo can be flexibly switched between different modes through the remote control or APP (Auto/Spot /Edge/Zig-zag cleaning) to meet the different cleaning needs of the family. Among them, the zigzag path can cover the largest area for cleaning, reduce missed scanning, and increase efficiency by 30%.
body.description: BR151 Robot Vacuum Cleaner and Mop Combo Let's make cleaning easier ZCWA smart robot vacuum and mop is an effective way to freed you from the rather boring household chores, allowing you spend more time with your family members,or concentrate your energy on your work. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Intelligent Mopping System Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo, vacuuming and mopping your house alternately. With a high-capacity 230ml electronic water tank, you can set 2 different water flow levels for specific cleaning needs. Fully fitted mop, excellent water absorption performance, depth control of water speed and water volume, to solve blind water seepage. 1400Pa Strong Suction Mopping Robot Vacuum with 1400Pa suction tackles dirt, debris, and pet hair more quickly and effectively on hardwood, tile, laminate, and low-pile carpets. Can also be a playmate for pets, ideal for families with pets. Z-shape Route, High Coverage This robot vacuum cleaner defaults to a random cleaning path. The zigzag cleaning can be selected through the remote control or APP. Z-type routing has high coverage, less missed scanning and high efficiency. (When using, please pay attention to avoid collision with the robot vacuum cleaner, otherwise it will change the Zig-zag Cleaning cleaning path.)

Barrier-free Cleaning Robot Vacuums can intelligently identify and detect changes in the ground environment, and transition from wood floor to carpet without resistance, and the obstacle-crossing ability can reach 0.59in, continuous cleaning across the room without worrying about getting stuck. Safe and efficient cleaning The robot vacuum is equipped with an infrared sensor, which is close to the furniture/white wall/obstacle, and instantly recognizes and slows down to prevent collisions. Fall induction technology, perceives steps, effectively avoids falling from stairs or edges (The anti drop height is 3.14 inches). Plan the best route to achieve an efficient and thorough cleaning. Automatic Charging The longest battery life of the Automatic robot vacuum clean is 100 minutes. When the battery is low or cleaning is complete, it will automatically return to the charging station. The infrared sensor of the robotic vacuum cleaner can search and sense the charging base at a distance of 60 to 80 in. It will first enter the random search mode for 5 mins. If it is not detected, it will enter the Yanbian mode search for 20 mins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Vac all together - Very good Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: This is a great vac considering how low maintenance it is. While playing on the computer, I Crank This Baby up, put my headphones on, and do two things at once. As well, I do have long hair, so I shed a lot of hair on the floor. It does get caught in the rotor and thus I have to remove the hair from the rotor axis probably once or twice a week. But it is very easy to remove and let continue. It's as easy as cheese. Just pick up good ol' Harold, turn it around, pull off the rotor, and BAM! Pull out the hair, that isn't stuck to the actual rotor motor. QUICK AND SIMPLE. it is also NOT A BRUSH VAC. YOU HEARD ME RIGHT FOLKS, NOT A TRADITIONAL BRUSH VAC. Simple cleaning on hard wood floors, I don't know about carpet, but I don't have to open up the brush and clean it with a stick to remove hair from the brush, and then when I'm done, have to open the cylinder to remove the hair from the axle. NONE OF THAT. SIMPLE MAINTENANCE. Buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible value for $ and smart design
reviews.reviewText: This is the third robot vacuum I have owned, all different brands. The first one was a gift from my children, and it felt life changing to have (after two decades of tiring housework it was amazing to have this major task taken off my plate). I decided to buy a second one a year later to try the mop feature (in hopes of taking another task off my very full plate). Both of those vacuums have been great, but this new one which I bought last month is definitely my favorite. The sleek blue design is nice, but most importantly the functions all work exceedingly well, and it does not have some of the downsides I experienced with the other two. The robot does not get stuck under cabinets, dressers, etc. - an unfortunate quirk that causes(d) my other ones to stall or spin out. It has such a smart design which among other benefits makes it super easy to clean in between uses. I especially like how the vacuum and mop functions are designed to function together on the unit (but can be used separately). It's nice to not have to switch out the parts in between vacuuming and mopping. I'm really happy with this new robot vacuum and the price was amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it! Awesome little vac, time saver, gets all the dog hair!
reviews.reviewText: I have had this vac for almost a year and it still works like new, clean all the dog hair no problem, its low maintenance, easy to empty. battery lasts beyond my needs. Looks nice and keeps the house clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great no frills robot vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This is a great no frills robot vac. It has very good suction and the two brushes are great at getting the edges of your walls and around the bases of furniture. It is low enough to get under couches and counter edges. It picks up our dog hair without issue and isn't too loud. I can't give this 5 stars for a few reasons.First, it does not return to it's base when it is done with it's cleaning cycle. It just stops wherever it is done, which is odd because if you press the charge button it will return to the base. It is not a battery issue, because it always has around 30-40% charge left.Second, it will sometimes stop when it is close to an object, but sometimes it will actually hit the object before it stops. It doesn't do any damage to the object, but it does seem to be getting a lot of scratches on the front of the unit. Hopefully that will not affect the operation of it down the road.Lastly, the app is lacking some features that would make it easier to use the vacuum. The remote has more options than the app. It would be nice to be able to have more options and information on the app.Overall, this has been a good purchase, and it does everything that the more expensive ones do at a much better price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for pet owners and parents!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely love this product! It helps me tremendously, by saving time, picking up all that pet hair (we have cats & dogs) and sweeps and mops at the same time for me! I love that I can sit back drink my coffee or read a book as it goes, also having the ability to use the app or the remote to help if it gets stuck or I want it to go over another area is wonderful. I would highly recommend this product as a must for anyone with little kids or pets! It used to take me a while to sweep and mop every single day, which I did because of my pets or the pet hair got out of control, and now like I said I can sit back take a break or do something else while this goes.Every now and then it can get stuck under a piece of furniture or pull a cord it never really wraps the cords up but it can pull them and it cuts itself off, so I do like that feature. I do not run it unless I'm home and can keep an eye on it. That's just my personal preference. I thought it was a really good deal I bought it when it was on a major sale and I actually bought this because my 14-year-old said mom you need this and sent me the link. Lol I almost didn't get it and I went ahead and got it for myself for a birthday gift. I am so glad I did!It's super easy to clean every time I use it I dump the dustbin out, I actually dumped the little dustbin out for each new area / room that I put it in. After dumping out the dustbin you wash out the dustbin and the filter you dump the water that's left over in the reservoir and you set them out of dry you pull the little pad off the bottom and you can wash it in the sink or throw it in the washer, you can order extras of these and once all that dries you can use it again the next day. I'm sure you could wait in between if you want to use it for a couple days before washing it but it does recommend with each use to do this and I find it's very quick and easy. You can also hit a button so it will return itself home. Where it will get on the base and begin to charge. The charge lasts very well I usually do a pretty good size living room dining room kitchen hallway and bathroom all at once and the battery never dies. If you're on the fence about it just go ahead and get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this robot vaccum around 8 months ago and it’s still working great! It’s so convenient and keeps my floors nice and clean. We have a mastiff and this things works wonders by keeping the dog hair up.I love that it “mops” as well!Great price and great product! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this right after I vacuum seal other my standup vacuum and it still finds a whole lot of gunk!
